scripts.prepare: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ts,py,pr" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run prepare:frontend" "npm run prepare:backend" "npm run prepare:proto"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n "FE,BE,+F,+B" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue,bgMagenta" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:test" "npm run dev:backend:test"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && call .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && npx concurrently -k -n ws,http "python -u main.py" "hypercorn app -b localhost:9001"
scripts.dev:backend+host: cd backend && call .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && npx concurrently -k -n ws,http "cross-env BACKEND_HOST=0.0.0.0 python -u main.py" "cross-env FS_CORS='*' hypercorn app -b 0.0.0.0:9001"
scripts.coverage: cd backend && call .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pytest --cov=. --cov-report=html && http-server htmlcov
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -m 1 -n "ts,py,pr" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:proto"
scripts.background: cd backend && python -m uv run background.py
scripts.start: cd backend && python -m uv run service.py
